agents.name: AgentOps AI
agents.shortDescription: Build and monitor reliable AI agents with comprehensive testing and replay analytics.
agents.longDescription: AgentsOpsAI is an industry-leading developer platform designed to test, debug, and monitor AI agents. It provides tools for recording LLM prompts, completions, and timestamps, logging events and calls, and linking errors back to their causal events. This platform aims to eliminate the black-box nature of AI agents, offering transparency and insight into their operations through a visual dashboard.
keyFeatures:
Monitoring and logging of AI agent activities,
Replay analytics for debugging,
Visualization of LLM calls and agent interactions,
Error tracking and causal event linking,
Session drilldown and meta-analysis
useCases:
Debugging AI agents,
Monitoring AI agent performance,
Analyzing LLM prompt and completion data,
Visualizing multi-agent interactions,
Enhancing AI agent reliability
agents.tags: AI agents, monitoring, debugging, replay analytics, LLM, error tracking, visualization, developer tools

agents.name: Langfuse
agents.shortDescription: LLM engineering platform for observability and metrics
agents.longDescription: Langfuse is an open-source LLM engineering platform designed to help developers build, monitor, and optimize large language model applications. It provides tools for observability, metrics tracking, prompt management, and evaluations, enabling teams to iterate on their LLM workflows efficiently. Users can self-host or use a cloud version, making it accessible for both startups and larger enterprises.
keyFeatures: LLM OBSERVABILITY, PROMPT MANAGEMENT, EVALUATIONS, DATASET MANAGEMENT, CLOUD AND SELF-HOSTING OPTIONS, INTEGRATIONS WITH POPULAR FRAMEWORKS, ASYNCHRONOUS OPERATION
useCases: LLM APPLICATION DEVELOPMENT, AI AGENT OPTIMIZATION, PERFORMANCE MONITORING, USER FEEDBACK LOOP, CONTINUOUS INTEGRATION
agents.tags: AI development, Natural language processing, Software engineering, Open-source software, Machine learning

agents.name: Burr
agents.shortDescription: Build reliable agents that make decisions. Monitor, trace, persist on your own infrastructure.
agents.longDescription:
Burr makes it easy to develop applications that make decisions (chatbots, agents, simulations, etc...) from simple python building blocks. Burr helps you ship reliable agents faster than other frameworks with it's built in real-time observability with self-hostable UI and tight developer experience that comes from it. Write code -> tracke it -> see a bug/hallucination -> create a test case for it -> ship reliable agents faster.

Burr works well for any application that uses LLMs, and can integrate with any of your favorite frameworks. Burr includes pluggable persisters (e.g. for memory) to save & load application state, as well as various pluggable extensions.
useCases: Build a GraphRAG chat bot
Build a streaming chat bot agent
Orchestrate a multi-agent architecture
Build a multi-modal chat bot
Build a human in the loop agentic application
agents.tags: agent, python, open source, AIOps, GenAIOps, orchestration,

agents.name: Wayfound
agents.shortDescription: Supervise, improve, and connect all your AI Agents in one place.
agents.longDescription: Wayfound is your central hub to monitor and improve your AI Agents, so you can scale your AI strategy with confidence.
keyFeatures: AI Agent monitoring & analytics, Continuous improvement with real-time feedback loops, Agent alignment to company and brand, Agent to agent collaboration
agents.tags: Agent management, Agent orchestration, Agent-to-agent collaboration, Analytics, Observability, Monitoring, Performance Improvement

agents.name: Temperstack
agents.shortDescription: Temperstack is a reliability automation  product .
agents.longDescription: Temperstack is an innovative platform designed to enhance incident management and system reliability. It leverages existing observability stacks to achieve exceptional uptime (>99.99%), automating service catalogs, alert audits, and SLI reporting across multiple observability tools. Temperstack provides a unified command interface for visibility, proactive issue detection, and collaboration across teams, helping organizations maintain focus on core business objectives while ensuring optimal system performance and stability.
keyFeatures: Reorganizes monitoring and alerting across APIs and infrastructure
Facilitates effortless achievement of high reliability
useCases: Alert Health: Gives engineering teams actionable insights on alerting effectiveness
Alert Automation: Automates and simplifies alert configuration.
Incident Management: Built-in system to ensure the right engineers are notified during incidents.
AI-Powered Runbooks: Delivers step-by-step instructions for debugging and resolving issues

agents.name: Coval (YC S24)
agents.shortDescription: A simulation and evaluation platform for AI agents
agents.longDescription: Coval is a simulation and evaluation platform for AI agents, inspired by techniques from the autonomous vehicle industry. It automates testing processes for AI assistants across various modalities, including chat and voice. Coval's platform helps engineers boost test coverage, speed up development, and validate consistent performance of AI agents, addressing the challenges of manual testing and improving reliability.
keyFeatures: AUTOMATED SIMULATION, AI AGENT EVALUATION, STATISTICAL VALIDATION, RELIABILITY TESTING, PERFORMANCE MONITORING, DEVELOPMENT ACCELERATION, EDGE CASE DETECTION, CONTINUOUS INTEGRATION, MULTI-MODAL TESTING
useCases: CHATBOT QUALITY ASSURANCE, VOICE ASSISTANT OPTIMIZATION, AI AGENT PERFORMANCE VALIDATION, AUTOMATED TESTING WORKFLOWS, DEVELOPMENT CYCLE ACCELERATION
agents.tags: AI testing, simulation platform, agent evaluation, reliability testing, automated QA

agents.name: Weave
agents.shortDescription: Lightweight toolkit for tracking and evaluating LLM applications
agents.longDescription:
Building demos of Generative AI applications is deceptively easy; getting them into production (and maintaining their high quality) is not. W&B Weave is here to help developers build and iterate on their AI applications with confidence.

Create rigorous apples-to-apples evaluations to score the behavior of any aspect of your app. Examine and debug failures by easily inspecting inputs and outputs. Deliver high performing AI applications to production.

agents.name: Arize AI
agents.shortDescription: AI observability and LLM evaluation platform for monitoring and improving ML models
agents.longDescription: Arize AI is an ML observability platform that helps AI engineers and data scientists monitor, troubleshoot, and evaluate LLM models. It enables teams to surface model issues quickly, resolve root causes, and improve overall model performance. The platform supports continuous monitoring and improvement across the entire ML lifecycle, from deployment to production, with features for detecting drift, analyzing performance, and tracing issues back to problematic data
useCases: DETECTING MODEL DRIFT IN PRODUCTION,
ANALYZING AGGREGATE MODEL PERFORMANCE,
CONDUCTING A/B PERFORMANCE COMPARISONS,
MANAGING DATA QUALITY ISSUES,
ANALYZING MODEL FAIRNESS METRICS,
EVALUATING LLM TASK PERFORMANCE

agents.name: LangSmith
agents.shortDescription: Unified platform for debugging, testing, and monitoring LLM applications
agents.longDescription: LangSmith is a comprehensive developer platform designed to streamline the entire lifecycle of LLM-powered applications. It offers tools for debugging, testing, evaluating, and monitoring LLM applications, helping developers bridge the gap between prototype and production. LangSmith provides visibility into complex LLM workflows, enables collaboration between developers and subject matter experts, and supports continuous improvement of AI systems.
useCases: DEBUGGING COMPLEX LLM WORKFLOWS,
OPTIMIZING LLM APPLICATION PERFORMANCE,
EVALUATING MODEL OUTPUTS,
CREATING AND MANAGING DATASETS FOR TESTING,
MONITORING PRODUCTION LLM APPLICATIONS,
COLLABORATIVE PROMPT ENGINEERING

agents.name: NOFireAI
agents.shortDescription: The Incidents Resolution AI for SREs and on-call Engineers battling constant firefighting
agents.longDescription: Every cloud-native company faces challenges with software reliability, often hampered by manual, time-consuming engineering tasks during critical incidents. NOFire AI revolutionizes incident management by drastically reducing time-to-resolution through automated root cause analysis. Moving beyond relying on correlation-based approaches, NOFire AI uncovers true causal relationships, even in the most complex SRE environments, enabling teams to go beyond symptoms to address the real issues. Seamlessly connecting to observability platforms, metrics, logs, Kubernetes, databases, and more, NOFire AI integrates with leading LLM providers like OpenAI, Mistral, and LLaMA to deliver a powerful, adaptive solution for modern engineering teams.
keyFeatures: Automated Alert Triaging, by generating classification for alerts
Automated Investigation for Root Cause Analysis to link triggered symptoms to actual causes
Automated Mitigation and Remediation Steps, by providing suggested solutions via generated Runbooks and Scripts.
useCases: Reduce time to resolution during incidents ( MTTR )
Alert Fatigue
Root Cause Analysis for cloud-native infrastructure
Mitigate Downtime costs

agents.name: FoundryAI (YC F24)
agents.shortDescription: Platform to build, evaluate, and improve AI agents for business automation
agents.longDescription: Foundry is a comprehensive platform designed to help businesses create, test, and enhance AI agents for various tasks. It offers tools for agent design, performance evaluation, and improvement through auto-prompting, fine-tuning, and steering. The platform aims to simplify the process of identifying weaknesses in AI agents and improving their reliability for real-world applications
keyFeatures: Performance evaluation using SOTA factuality checker
Automated improvement through auto-prompting and fine-tuning
Integration with internal knowledge bases and historical data
Orchestration layer for managing multiple agents
useCases: Customer support automation
Hiring and recruitment process optimization
Sales automation
Contract analysis and management
Workflow automation across various business functions
Multi-agent collaboration and management

agents.name: Vocera AI
agents.shortDescription: Monitoring and testing for your Voice AI Agents
agents.longDescription: Vocera AI is a platform designed to test, evaluate, and improve AI agents. It offers tools for simulating scenarios, replaying real conversations, and conducting evaluations to ensure AI agents perform optimally across various workflows and personalities. The service aims to help businesses identify and fix issues in their AI agents before deployment, enhancing reliability and compliance.
useCases: Testing AI agents for appointment cancellation scenarios
Evaluating AI performance with impatient or interruptive users
Identifying and resolving recurring issues in AI conversations
Ensuring compliance checks are consistently performed
Optimizing AI agents for various user personalities
Streamlining the process of creating and onboarding new AI agents
Reducing time spent on manual testing of AI systems

agents.name: Guardian
agents.shortDescription: Securing the Future of Autonomous Intelligence
agents.longDescription: Guardian secures Agentic AI systems by integrating with leading orchestration frameworks like Crewai, Phidata, and Microsoft Autogen, delivering robust protection for AI-driven workflows. Additionally, it supports IDE endpoints and browser plugins, providing seamless security for developers and enterprise applications.
keyFeatures: Content Control, Filtering and Advanced Content Analysis
useCases: A Global Automotive Giant secures LLM-based IT Support Chatbot from PII leaks and Prompt Injection Attacks
Consumer Electronics & Technology MNC accelerates GenAI PoC to Production with Guardian Enterprise Sandbox
Leading GSI Achieves 4x Productivity for its Responsible AI Practice with Platform-Level ML Security Automation
UK Bank reduces operational risks and losses from ML-based transaction fraud detection model
Protecting 1000+ AI Models in Critical Oil & Gas Operations with AISpectra’s Advanced AI Security
